div.div: at Westminster, Md. | Kenneth R. Gill

tr.td: McDaniel wins toss, defers. SU will receive. MCD defends S end zone.

S. Wiersberg kickoff 51 yards to the SUS14, Brandon Tinson return 8 yards to the SUS22 (N Godfrey), PENALTY MCD unsportmanlike conduct (Tucker Evans) 15 yards to the SUS37, 1st and 10, SUS ball on SUS37.
Nick Crusco at QB for Susquehanna.
Nick Crusco pass complete to Devon Pascoe for 20 yards to the MCD43, out-of-bounds (Cole Branche).
Luke Robertson rush for 5 yards to the MCD38 (Ben Kahn; Keegan Romanoff).
Tommy Bluj rush for 2 yards to the MCD36 (Cole Branche).
Nick Crusco pass complete to Tommy Bluj for 5 yards to the MCD31 (Matt Quattrone).
Nick Crusco pass incomplete to Robert Marks.
Luke Robertson rush for 6 yards to the MCD25 (Matt Quattrone; Xavier Brooks).
Nick Crusco pass incomplete to Robert Marks (Raymond Doh).
Evan Argiriou field goal attempt from 42 MISSED - short, spot at MCD25, clock 12:23.
Will Koester at QB for McDaniel.
P Stefanelli rush for 2 yards to the MCD27 (Cole Dixon).
Will Koester pass incomplete to Andre Henry.
PENALTY MCD false start (Andre Henry) 5 yards to the MCD22.
